mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_name, user_tel, password, user_type) VALUES (#{userName}, #{userTel}, #{password}, #{userType})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_name = #{userName}, user_address = #{userAddress}, user_gender = #{userGender} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE user SET user_avatar = #{userAvatar} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, user_tel, user_avatar, user_address, user_gender FROM user WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE user_tel = #{userTel}
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_tel, user_avatar, user_address, user_gender FROM user WHERE user_tel = #{userTel} AND password = #{password}
